Uses of Package
popt4jlib.GradientDescent

  • Packages that use popt4jlib.GradientDescent 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
  • Classes in popt4jlib.GradientDescent used by popt4jlib.GradientDescent 
    Class and Description
    AcceleratedGradientDescent.AGDThread
    nested class implementing the threads to be used by ArmijoSteepestDescent main class
    ArmijoBFGS.ABFGSThread
    inner class implementing the threads that will do the concurrent computations from different starting points.
    ArmijoSteepestDescent
    Steepest Descent using Armijo rule for step-size determination.
    ArmijoSteepestDescent.ASDThread 
    FCGThread
    auxiliary class implementing the threads that run each optimization attempt of the main FletcherConjugateGradient.optimize(f) method.
    FletcherConjugateGradient
    Implementation of the Conjugate-Gradient method for nonlinear optimization, using the Fletcher-Reeves formula for updating the b parameter, and the Al-Baali - Fletcher bracketing & sectioning method for step-size determination.
    OneDStepQuantumOptimizer
    the class implements a minimization method for a function alone one of its variables, using an initial starting point x0, and a quantum step-size that the variable must be constrained to take values on multiples of.
    PolakRibiereConjugateGradient
    class that implements the Conjugate-Gradient method for (unconstrained) nonlinear optimization using the Polak-Ribiere formula for updating b, and the Armijo rule for step-size determination.
    PRCGThread
    auxiliary class implementing the CG method using the Polak-Ribiere formula for b updates and Armijo rule for step-size determination.
    RandomDescents
    class implementing a "questionable" method of attempting multiple descent directions (in parallel) from the same iterate point, and greedily choosing the best one using the Armijo rule for step-size determination.
    RandomDescents.RDThread
